duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care management including clinical medical assisting, patient education, laboratory collections, and documentation.
Assist with preparing patients for examinations and procedures, and obtaining referrals or authorizations.
Clean and organize examination rooms and work areas, answer patient calls, and assist with scheduling patient appointments and registration.
Participate in cross-training opportunities and collaborate with healthcare team members to identify improvement needs and increase office efficiencies.
Occasionally assist in covering another Pediatric clinic when needed.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Graduation from an approved certified program for assistants in the required specialty. Certification by an approved accredited certifying agency in the specialty.
